fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Enlargement, Energy, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Eastern Neighbourhood Policy, EU Belarus relations, trade and investment initiatives, Foreign Policy.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: The BEUBC is a member of the Belarus Chamber of Commerce and Industry. We also have a representative in Minsk to assist international companies with any issues regarding inward investment or trade matters, to help provide business solutions for any commercial problems. We offer business consulting solutions to EU and other international companies looking to source business information about Belarus. We are also a member of the consortium East-Invest which is managed by Eurochambres.
goals__remit: To promote trade and investment between Belarus and the EU.
